Which of the following relations is correct?
In a npn bipolar junction transistor, the emitter injection efficiency takes into account the
ENGLISH.OPT1: minority carrier hole diffusion current in emitter.
ENGLISH.OPT2: majority carrier hole drift current in emitter.
ENGLISH.OPT3: minority carrier electron diffusion current in collector.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: A transistor with α = 0.98 and at quiescent point is equal to 100 μA. Then the emitter quiescent current is

If an n-channel enhancement MOSFET is biased in common source mode such that its gate to source voltage VGS = 2 V, drain to source voltage VDS = 3 V, and VT = 1 V.
The value of transconductance is _________
(Neglect channel length modulation).

Consider n-type silicon in MOS structure with doping concentration of 3 × 1014 cm–3 at T = 300 K, intrinsic carrier concentration of silicon, = 1.5 × 1010 cm–3. The surface potential that results in maximum space charge width is _________ V. (correct to two decimal places)
(Assume, VT = 26 mV)

For a particular MOSFET operating in the saturation region, at a constant gate to source voltage (VGS), drain current is found to be 2 mA for VDS = 4 V and 2.5 mA for VDS = 8 V. Then the value of channel length modulation parameter is _____________ V–1. (correct to two decimal places)
Which of the following statements is/are true in the construction of a Bipolar junction transistor?
ENGLISH.OPT1: The collector region dissipates more power.
ENGLISH.OPT3: The collector is made physically larger than emitter.
ENGLISH.OPT4: The emitter and collector can be interchanged.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: For the N-channel depletion mode MOSFET in circuit shown below, VTN = –2 V and As sume that, VDD = 5 V and Rs = 5 kΩ. Then the value of VDS (drain to source voltage) is

The n-channel EMOSFETs T1 and T2 are connected as shown below. Both the MOSFETs are identical except that, the channel width of T2 is twice that of T1.

If the threshold voltage of T1 and T2 are 1.5 V, then value of output voltage V0 will be
(Assume all non-ideal effects are negligible)
A MOSFET operating at mA has transconductance (gm) of 1 mA/V. Assume the MOSFET is operating in saturation region, then the value of (Vgs – Vth) is

A depletion type N-channel MOSFET is biased in linear region for use as a voltage controlled resistor. At VGS = 2 V, the drain to source resistance (rds) is found to be 500 Ω. If VGS is increased to 3 V, then the value of rds is
(Assume, Threshold voltage, VTh = –0.5 V and the value of VDS to be very small)

The near punch-through voltage of an n-channel MOSFET is to be no less than VDS = 5 V. The source and drain regions are doped with Nd = 1019 cm–3 and the channel region is doped with Na = 3 × 1016 cm–3. The source and body are at ground potential. Then the zero-biased sourcesubstrate junction width is equal to ________ μm. (Assume, = 1.5 × 1010 cm–3,VT = 25.9 mV)

The parameters of the base region of an npn bipolar transistor are Dn = 20 cm2/sec, nB0 = 104 cm–3, base width WB = 1 μm and area of base-emitter junction ABE = 10–4 cm2. Then the collector current for VBE = 0.5 V is ________ × 10–6 A. (upto two decimal places) (Assume, Ln >> WB, η = 1, VT = 25.9 mV)

In a particular bipolar junction transistor, the base transit time is 20% of total delay time. The base width is 1 μm and the base diffusion coefficient is DB = 20 cm2/s. The cutoff frequency of transistor is _________ MHz (upto two decimal places)

A photo-diode has an area of 1 × 1 cm and is illuminated by light with nm and with a power density of 1000 W/m2. Assume at 300 K, the open circuit voltage is 0.683 V and the quantum efficiency of photodiode is 100%. Then, which of the following options is/are correct?
ENGLISH.OPT1: the photo flux is equal to 392 × 1015 photons s–1.
ENGLISH.OPT3: the reverse saturation current is equal to 2 pA.
ENGLISH.OPT4: the photo flux is equal to 3.92 × 1013 photons s–1.
